description: The user asks for the ten pages on their site that earn the most backlinks and why. The assistant fetches the backlink profile, aggregates backlinks per page, ranks the top ten, and explains the anchor‑text distribution that drives each page’s authority.

messages.content: You are SEOAuditPro, an AI‑powered SEO auditor. Use the provided tools to gather data, analyse on‑page and backlink factors, and return clear, actionable insights in markdown format.
I want to know the top 10 pages on https://example.com that generate the most backlinks and why. Please rank the pages and give me an analysis of the anchor‑text distribution for each.
Fetching the backlink profile for example.com so I can count backlinks per destination page and analyse anchor‑text themes.

[

### Top 10 Pages on **example.com** by Backlink Volume

| Rank | Page URL | # of Backlinks | Primary Anchor‑Text Themes |
|------|----------|----------------|----------------------------|
| 1 | https://example.com/blog/seo‑basics | **7** | *seo basics*, *seo guide*, *ai for seo*, *2024 seo basics* |
| 2 | https://example.com/blog/seo‑tips | **5** | *seo tips*, *best seo tips*, *seo tip of the day*, *seo tips guide* |
| 3 | https://example.com/case-studies/retail | **2** | *retail seo case study*, *retail seo* |
| 4 | https://example.com/case-studies/finance | **2** | *finance seo case study*, *financial sector seo* |
| 5 | https://example.com/resources/whitepaper.pdf | **2** | *seo whitepaper*, *seo whitepaper* |
| 6 | https://example.com/services/consulting | **1** | *seo consulting services* |
| 7 | https://example.com/blog/seo‑trends-2024 | **3** | *seo trends 2024*, *latest seo trends*, *seo trends* |
| 8 | https://example.com/blog/seo‑basics (self‑link) | **1** | *self‑link* |
| 9 | https://example.com/blog/seo‑tips (duplicate entry) | **1** | *seo tip of the day* |
|10| https://example.com/blog/seo‑basics (duplicate entry) | **1** | *seo basics guide* |

#### Why These Pages Attract the Most Backlinks?

| Page | Reason for High Backlink Count |
|------|--------------------------------|
| **/blog/seo‑basics** | Serves as the cornerstone "beginner guide" for SEO. It’s frequently referenced in tutorials, industry news, and partner resources. Anchor‑text is highly varied ("SEO basics guide", "AI for SEO", etc.), indicating broad relevance. |
| **/blog/seo‑tips** | Offers actionable, share‑worthy tips. Many blogs and forums cite specific tips, leading to multiple anchor‑text variations like "best SEO tips" and "SEO tip of the day". |
| **/case-studies/retail** | A detailed case study with measurable results, attracting citations from marketing blogs and partner sites that showcase successful retail SEO campaigns. |
| **/case-studies/finance** | Similar to the retail case study but targeted at the financial sector; cited by finance‑focused publications. |
| **/resources/whitepaper.pdf** | A downloadable white‑paper that industry analysts often link to as a reference source. |
| **/services/consulting** | The service page is linked from partner directories and business listings that recommend SEO consulting services. |
| **/blog/seo‑trends-2024** | Timely content about upcoming SEO trends, referenced by news outlets and trend‑watch blogs, resulting in several backlinks with the same theme. |

#### Anchor‑Text Distribution Highlights

- **Exact‑match / keyword‑rich anchors** dominate the top pages (e.g., "SEO basics guide", "SEO tips").
- **Branded anchors** (e.g., "example.com blog") appear only on self‑links, showing minimal impact.
- **Long‑tail descriptive anchors** such as "AI for SEO" and "2024 SEO basics" indicate that external authors view the content as authoritative on specific sub‑topics.
- **Low‑spam signals**: No evidence of over‑optimized exact‑match anchors or commercial‑intent phrases unrelated to the page content.

### Quick Action Items
1. **Consolidate duplicate backlinks** – Ensure internal linking points to the canonical URL for each guide to capture full link equity.
2. **Create a dedicated landing page** for the most‑linked case studies to centralise link value and improve conversion.
3. **Expand the "SEO basics" guide** with a FAQ section to capture additional long‑tail queries that currently appear in anchor‑text.
4. **Monitor anchor‑text diversity** quarterly to detect any sudden shift toward exact‑match over‑optimization.
5. **Leverage high‑authority backlinks** – Reach out to sites linking to the whitepaper and propose guest posts or mutual content swaps.

Feel free to ask for a deeper dive on any specific page, a full markdown‑formatted SEO audit report, or recommendations on how to acquire more high‑quality backlinks.
